item.description:
Trim & Tone uses isolations to build lean strong muscles throughout the body. We use a chair, a body ball, free weights, and resistance bands to help balance and use our own body weight to build muscles you may have forgot about. You will leave this class knowing and feeling like you got an unbelievable workout. It improves posture, builds lean muscle, and burns calories all at once. If you've always wanted a ballerina body give it try!

At Bridget's Dance Studio you won't have to deal with the overcrowded gym floor or expensive membership fees. Just sign up at www.bridgetsdancestudio.com the day before you'd like to take a class. New Year special $7 a class or get one free with a ten pack for only $60!

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Trim & Tone
